delegationMsg: Hi, welcome to join Hive family. You have received delegation from DBuzz and hope you enjoy your journey with the community
delegationLengthMsg: Hi, the RC delegated to you will be revoked since the delegation now exceeds 60 days
delegationMuteMsg: Hi, the RC delegated to you will be revoked since you have been muted by @dbuzz. If you have any concern, please contact @dbuzz
delegationBeneficiaryMsg: Hi, the RC delegated to you will be revoked since you have removed the default beneficiary settings to @dbuzz
delegationMaxMsg: Hi, the RC delegated to you will be revoked since you already have at least 15 HP which is enough for playing around Hive. Hope everything goes well with in your future journey.
